# Gradient Ascent
- To maximize loss function unlike [Gradient Descent gradients](Gradient%20Descent%20gradients.qmd)
- Proportional to positive of gradient
- $$\theta_{t+1} = \theta{t} + \eta_t \Sigma_{n=1}^N(\nabla l_n(\theta_t))^T$$
